content: [hakon] Hakon joins you with his personal bodyguard, Mogr. Behind him the prince, Ludin, and his entourage are in tow, though looking less than pleased to be here.
[hakon] Hakon joins you on the wall. Behind him the prince, Ludin, and his entourage are in tow, though looking less than pleased to be here.
[hakon] Hakon joins you on the wall with his personal bodyguard, Mogr. Behind him the prince, Ludin, stands alone, looking miserable.
[hakon] Hakon joins you on the wall. Behind him the prince, Ludin, stands alone, looking miserable. It's clear they have no love for each other.
[hakon] Hakon joins you on the wall with his personal bodyguard, Mogr. You discuss what to do next.
[hakon] Hakon joins you on the wall by himself, having sent his warriors to prepare below. You discuss what to do next.
[hakon] Hakon's caravan enters the city, fighting off waves of dredge as they go. To your relief hundreds of skilled warriors are now safely in Boersgard.

[juno] "I have one last trip to make. I need this one to come with me," she says, pointing to you. "I'm sorry, Eyvind. You must wait for me one last time. Do not let the city fall before I return." It takes everything within Eyvind's power to hold back, but he does.

[juno] Juno pauses and something shifts in your vision, for just a moment. "I know it's hard," she says, her voice filling your head, "And you've already been through a lot." As she speaks again the rest of the world melts away. "But you're needed." You can't find the words to argue.

[juno] "Not far," says Juno. She pauses and something shifts in your vision, for just a moment. "I know it's hard," she says, her voice filling your head, "And you've already been through a lot." As she speaks again the rest of the world melts away. "But you're needed." You can't find the words to argue.
[rook] She turns to you. "Rook? Come with me. We'll return in two days, maybe less if you're as quick as you look. Tell anyone who needs to know."
